Articles.Content:
I realized the faint pun in the subject as I was typing it.

Anyhow, whenever I try to report a post, I can enter the reason and hit submit, but it never seems to do anything. Just endless loading.

This is happening on Google Chrome Version 35.0.1916.153 m, with all addons disabled as well.
This issue has been around for a while, but I can assure you that the reports do go through.

Just leave it for a while, it does take a time to "send"

Also, do the mods know when it does send? Because I don't want to wait the time it usually takes to report a bad post.
The last few times I have reported something, the page actually times out and doesn't return you to the "finished" page - but the report seems to go through anyway.
Slight update on this. I let it go for some time when sending a report, and eventually it kicked to a 504 error. I hope this helps.
I usually just click again, and it says please wait 60 seconds before reporting another post. So it seems to work.
You guys don't even need to wait. I did some testing a while, just send the report, and as soon as it starts loading, wait a few seconds to be sure, and close the tab, it went through already

The 504 errors are not very reassuring. Surely some people must think that the report hasn't gone through and report the same post again. Or think that reporting doesn't work at all and stop doing it. Can this be fixed or do we have to wait for the forum upgrade?
